channel.title: 704 Client connecting
channel.description: I'm having trouble with people connecting to my server with the 704 client - DemolitionX's client. It just sticks at "Checking for updates - 1%" I've changed ALL the ip's in each file that had an ip ;D Any additional information needed can be supplied, just ask.

item.title: 704 Client connecting
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“anti man444, post:3, topic:449815”][quote author=ratio link=topic=552711.msg4050215#msg4050215 date=1342437332]
your source isnt working
[/quote]

wooww!! -.- we all know

maybe youre ip isn’t correct chek youre loader.java youre client.java and gamestub.java

i hope i helped
(if helped maybe you can rep++?)
ty[/quote]
Already did. It just sticks at ‘Checking for updates 1%’ and it works if I have it on local host… so my source works.

tl;dr - Client only connects if i have it set to localhost :3

Read full topic
